Member Function Documentation

bool UPath::GetDriveRoot ( tstring &  root  )  const

if this path contains a drive specifier, then the drive's root path is returned in 'root' and this function returns true. If a drive is not specified in this path, this function returns false.

get the location of the drive specifier.

get the root path and append a backslash.

return true to indicate that a root path was specified.
